description:
Numa related exception process by v2 api: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/2014.2.rc2/nova/api/openstack/compute/servers.py#L996

But it isn't processed by v2.1 api.
title: Numa related exception didn't process by v2.1 api

comments.content:
Numa related exception process by v2 api: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/2014.2.rc2/nova/api/openstack/compute/servers.py#L996

But it isn't processed by v2.1 api.

Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/127894

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/127894
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=b20be459b2976d9e979c6f693099e5566071abca
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit b20be459b2976d9e979c6f693099e5566071abca
Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Oct 13 16:26:04 2014 +0800

    Catch NUMA related exceptions for create server v2.1 API
    
    The exceptions are raised by nova down-layer should be caught by REST
    API layer explicitly. The NUMA related exceptions were caught by V2
    API, but weren't caught by V2.1 yet. This patch ports the changes and
    unittest into this V2.1 API.
    
    Change-Id: I56296426569730d53e91e58e9043ed510896d339
    Closes-Bug: #1380513
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
